intro: Step into the dugout and experience the future of football management on Nintendo Switch™.
description:
OUT NOW – PLAY TODAY
New foundations set the stage for you to define your footballing destiny. Made with Unity, FM26 Touch brings you closer to the action.
MATCH DAY DRAMA
Powered by the Unity graphics engine, matchdays feel more dramatic than ever thanks to volumetric animations from real football matches and improved on-pitch detail.
TOTAL FOOTBALL, TOTAL CONTROL
Delivering smoother navigation, an upgraded UI enables smooth, intuitive navigation through your wider game world, from squad building to match preparation.
PREMIER LEAGUE. FULLY LICENSED
Compete for glory in the Premier League, now vividly brought to life with official kits, club logos, broadcast graphics and player images.
YOUR MANAGER, YOUR WAY
Express more of your personality, style and backstory in every career with a revamped manager creation experience.
ADVANCED TACTICAL INNOVATION
Make your mark on the pitch with distinct in and out-of-possession formations and level up your gameplans with new and redefined player roles.
TRANSFORMATIVE TRANSFER TOOLS
Harness new recruitment tools, powered by football’s transfer marketplace TransferRoom, to smartly shape your title-winning squads.
INTRODUCING: WOMEN’S FOOTBALL
Break new ground as women’s football seamlessly joins FM in one footballing world with 14 playable leagues across 11 nations, including elite competitions like the WSL and NWSL.
In FM26 Touch, football belongs to you and your vision. Change the Game.
